transcript: Jeff Bezos right now owns 10 of Amazon Elon owns 17 of Tesla these huge guys understood a concept which is the more money you can make other people the more money you make even though the pie is not 100 yours and it took me too long to understand because if you give other people slices of the pie then you can gain your time back disproportionately it'd be better to have 51 of 100 businesses than 100 of you know what I mean because you can just give the opportunity away but the problem is that everyone thinks the boat they're in is the only boat they'll ever be in for the rest of their lives not to say you shouldn't focus on that boat but I'm saying like we think so small
